item.title: Extreme Ownership (book notes)
item.description: Willink, Jocko, and Leif Babin. Extreme ownership: How US Navy SEALs lead and win. St. Martin’s Press, 2017. Leadership: The Single Most Important Factor Most leadership books focus on individual practices / personal character traits. But without a team there can be no leadership. Team: a group of individuals working to accomplish a mission. Leadership requires a diverse team of people in various groups to execute highly complex missions in order to achieve strategic goals
